imagingbook.pub.geometry.fitting

Class ProcrustesFit

  • java.lang.Object
    • imagingbook.pub.geometry.fitting.ProcrustesFit
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    LinearFit2D

    public class ProcrustesFit
extends Object
implements LinearFit2D
    Implements a 2-dimensional Procrustes fit, using the algorithm described in Shinji Umeyama, "Least-squares estimation of transformation parameters between two point patterns", IEEE Transactions on Pattern Analysis and Machine Intelligence 13.4 (Apr. 1991), pp. 376â€“380. Usage example (also see the main() method of this class): 
     Point[] P = ... // create sequence of 2D source points
 Point[] Q = ... // create sequence of 2D target points
 ProcrustesFit pf = new ProcrustesFit(P, Q);
 double err = pf.getError();
 RealMatrix R = pf.getR();
 RealVector t = pf.getT();
 double s = pf.getScale();
 double err = pf.getError();
 RealMatrix A = pf.getTransformationMatrix();
    Version:
    2020-01-05

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      ProcrustesFit(Point[] P, Point[] Q)
      Convenience constructor, with parameters allowTranslation, allowScaling and forceRotation set to true.
      ProcrustesFit(Point[] P, Point[] Q, boolean allowTranslation, boolean allowScaling, boolean forceRotation)
      Full constructor.

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Static Methods Instance Methods Concrete Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      double getError()
      Retrieves the total (squared) error for the estimated fit.
      org.apache.commons.math3.linear.RealMatrix getR()
      Retrieves the estimated orthogonal (rotation) matrix.
      double getScale()
      Retrieves the estimated scale.
      org.apache.commons.math3.linear.RealVector getT()
      Retrieves the estimated translation vector.
      org.apache.commons.math3.linear.RealMatrix getTransformationMatrix()
      Returns the (3,3) or (2,3) transformation matrix A for this fit, such that y_i ~ A * x_i (with x_i in homogeneous coordinates).
      static void main(String[] args)

    • Constructor Detail

      • ProcrustesFit

        public ProcrustesFit(Point[] P,
                     Point[] Q)
        Convenience constructor, with parameters allowTranslation, allowScaling and forceRotation set to true.
        Parameters:
        P - the source points
        Q - the target points

      • ProcrustesFit

        public ProcrustesFit(Point[] P,
                     Point[] Q,
                     boolean allowTranslation,
                     boolean allowScaling,
                     boolean forceRotation)
        Full constructor.
        Parameters:
        P - the first point sequence
        Q - the second point sequence
        allowTranslation - if true, translation (t) between point sets is considered, otherwise zero translation is assumed
        allowScaling - if true, scaling (s) between point sets is considered, otherwise unit scale assumed
        forceRotation - if true, the orthogonal part of the transformation (Q) is forced to a true rotation and no reflection is allowed

    • Method Detail

        Retrieves the estimated scale.

        The estimated scale (or 1 if allowscaling = false).

        public org.apache.commons.math3.linear.RealMatrix getTransformationMatrix()
        Description copied from interface: LinearFit2D
        Returns the (3,3) or (2,3) transformation matrix A for this fit, such that y_i ~ A * x_i (with x_i in homogeneous coordinates).
        Specified by:
